blogData.title: Patch Notes: September 2019
blogData.description:
It's been a busy month for us so far, we've updated a few features to
  make your Video Translator experience an easy one. Read on for our patch notes for
  September 2019.
blogData.keywords: ai transcription, ai translation, ai dubbing, product update video translator, product update video translation, value proposition video transcriber, value proposition video translator, traction video transcriber, traction video translator, use case video transcriber, use case video translator, youtube subtitles, video caption, youtube captions

data.richContent:
It’s been a busy month for us so far. There’s a lot of new and exciting features we’re still developing so watch this space! In the meantime, there are a couple of updates and patches to tell you about.

Embedding Captions

Previously, to embed captions onto your video it was possible to do so from the captions tab. This tab is now only used to make edits to the captions.
To embed captions, it is now done by using the Audio Overlay tab. There you’ll find the + button as highlighted in the below picture, which will allow you to embed the captions.

Picture in Picture

A feature we’re quite excited about, picture in picture is now available to use with the video player. This allows you to make real time edits to the captions and simultaneously see how those edits look on the video.

Working Symbol

Previously, it was hard to tell when the app was working and making changes to your video. We’ve now added a spinning hourglass to show when your file is being worked on.

New Dialects Added

We’re proud to announce another six dialects have been added!
From now on you can add the following dialects to your videos:

English:

  • Singapore

Norwegian Bokmål:

  • Norway

Swahili:

  • Tanzania

Tamil:

  • Singapore
  • Sri Lanka
  • Malaysia

Conclusion

Please connect with us on LinkedIn, YouTube or Facebook for any comments, questions, or just to keep up to date with the work we do!

We are very grateful for your support!

If you haven’t yet and are interested in trying out our technology, please try our platform, or drop us an email at hello@videotranslator.ai.

nodes.title: Bridging Languages, Unleashing Global Potential: Introducing Our New Website and App
nodes.description: Discover our website and app, with native multilingual support and powerful transcription, translation, and voiceover capabilities in 120 languages.
nodes.coverAlt: Bridging Languages, Unleashing Global Potential: Introducing Our New Website and App

nodes.title: What Team VideoTranslator Did In 2021
nodes.description: 2021 was a bit of a complex year. As I'm sure it was for many of you. Read more to learn about how Team VideoTranslator navigated 2021.

nodes.title: Merry Christmas!
nodes.description: As we close down 2021, we would like to wish everyone a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year. Thank you for your support this year!
